scripts.install: cd react-lib;npm install;cd -;cd mui-react-lib;npm install;cd -;cd mui-react-room;npm install;cd -
scripts.build: cd react-lib;npm run build&&sudo npm link;cd -;cd mui-react-lib;npm run build&&sudo npm link;cd -;cd mui-react-room;npm link @apirtc/react-lib @apirtc/mui-react-lib&&npm run build;cd -
